title: Big Baller or Ball on a Budget
itunes:title: Big Baller or Ball on a Budget
description:
Friday 5/5 - Its Cinco De Mayo but too bad we had no Tequilla or Tacos to celebrate. Instead we opened up the phone lines about former Football Player Lavar Ball and his son after a story broke out about Lavar pricing his son's shoe to a womping $495. Charlamagne thought what Lavar was trying to do was a great idea, therefore he made everyone that hated on Lavar Ball's idea Donkey of the Day. Also, TV host Kamau Bell joined us on the show.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Friday 5/5 - Its Cinco De Mayo but too bad we had no Tequilla or Tacos to celebrate. Instead we opened up the phone lines about former Football Player Lavar Ball and his son after a story broke out about Lavar pricing his son's shoe to a womping $495. Charlamagne thought what Lavar was trying to do was a great idea, therefore he made everyone that hated on Lavar Ball's idea Donkey of the Day. Also, TV host Kamau Bell joined us on the show.
